author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Arctic Liquid Freezer III on Amazon - https://geni.us/NrMtDT
Hardware news is back! We're talking about rumors of AMD Threadripper, the RX 9070, and RX 9060 XT. We also cover NVIDIA's ongoing GPU driver struggle, Logitech's price increases, and GTA VI getting delayed. On the upside, The Elder Scrolls: Oblivion Remastered launched recently and as a surprise. 

The best way to support our work is through our store (you can also find the garage sale items here): https://store.gamersnexus.net/?category=Garage+Sale

Watch our documentary about the impact of tariffs: The End of Affordable Computing - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1W_mSOS1Qts
Check out our thermal paste factory tour with Der8auer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HsIk_mMrt2w

Sources doc: https://www.one-tab.com/page/DvtBsh5iRK6s64NEbmXu1A

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

TIMESTAMPS

00:00 - Recap for the Week
01:25 - GN Spare Parts
04:43 - Ra
title: HW News - NVIDIA Keeps "Fixing" Its Drivers, AMD Threadripper, RX 9070 GRE, Intel Layoffs
